products.title: Buy 2 Millex churnam (800g Each) Get 1 Free Millet Rava Idli Mix  (400g) - Special OFFER
products.description_html:
Millex Millet Health Drink Mix is a wholesome and traditional blend of 30 natural ingredients, carefully curated to provide optimal nutrition and health benefits. This unique mix includes a combination of millets, cereals, pulses, dry fruits, nuts, seeds, and spices, making it a powerhouse of essential nutrients. Enriched with 18 vital Ayurvedic herbs such as Ashwagandha, Shatavari, Gokshura, Jeshtamadhu, and Hippali, this health mix is designed to boost overall well-being and vitality.

Key Benefits:

Nutrient-Rich: Packed with fiber, minerals, vitamins, proteins, and antioxidants to support a healthy lifestyle.

Energy Booster: Provides a balanced mix of proteins, carbohydrates, and healthy fats to fuel your day.

Weight Management: Low in calories and high in fiber, it helps in maintaining a healthy weight by promoting satiety and reducing unnecessary cravings.

Sugar Control: With a low glycemic index, it aids in regulating blood sugar levels, making it an excellent choice for those managing diabetes or insulin sensitivity.

Immunity Support: Helps in the natural production of vitamins and minerals, strengthening your body's defense system.

Digestive Health: High in fiber, it promotes a healthy digestive system for the entire family.

Ayurvedic Power: Enhanced with the proprietary ‚ÄòArogyamrutha Churna‚Äô formula, a blend of Ayurvedic herbs that offer additional health benefits and immunity to combat viral infections.

Why Choose Millex Millet Health Drink Mix?

100% natural with no artificial flavors, additives, or colors.

A perfect blend of traditional wisdom and modern nutrition.

Suitable for all age groups, making it an ideal choice for a healthy family.

Enjoy the goodness of nature in every sip or bite with Millex Millet Health Drink Mix ‚Äì your daily dose of health and wellness!

products.title: Sprouted Ragi Masala Dosa Mix - Pack of 3 (Total 1200g - each 400g)
products.description_html:
Millex Sprouted Ragi Masala Dosa Mix

Kickstart your day with a nutritious and flavorful breakfast! Millex Sprouted Ragi Masala Dosa Mix offers a healthy and wholesome way to energize your family. Crafted from sprouted ragi (finger millet), this mix is a powerhouse of essential nutrients, making it a smarter choice than regular dosa.

Why Choose Millex Sprouted Ragi Masala Dosa Mix?

Rich in Vitamins: Packed with Vitamin E and Vitamin C, it boosts immunity and promotes healthy skin and hair.

High in Protein: Ragi is naturally protein-rich, making it ideal for a balanced diet.

Mineral Powerhouse: Loaded with calcium, iron, and magnesium for overall wellness.

Gluten-Free & Low-Glycemic: Perfect for gluten-sensitive individuals or those managing blood sugar levels.

Heart-Healthy: Helps lower bad cholesterol and supports cardiovascular health.

Anti-Microbial Properties: Ragi‚Äôs natural anti-microbial benefits add an extra layer of protection.

Taste Meets Nutrition
Millex Sprouted Ragi Masala Dosa Mix blends the wholesome goodness of ragi with authentic masala flavours. It‚Äôs not just nutritious but also delicious, ensuring your family savours every bite.

Easy Ragi Dosa Recipe
With Millex‚Äôs instant mix, preparing a healthy breakfast has never been easier. Add water, prepare the batter, and perfectly cook your dosas. It‚Äôs the ultimate solution for busy mornings when you want to serve something nutritious without spending too much time in the kitchen.

Is Ragi Dosa Good for Weight Loss?
Yes! Ragi is high in fibre and protein, which helps keep you full for longer, making it an excellent choice for weight management.

Perfect for Everyday Health
Millex Sprouted Ragi Masala Dosa Mix is a versatile, high-fibre dosa mix perfect for any meal‚Äîbreakfast, lunch, or dinner. Give your family the daily nutrition they deserve with this millet dosa mix that everyone will love.

Order your pack of Millex Sprouted Ragi Masala Dosa Mix today and turn every meal into a celebration of health and flavour!
